animals.name: Penny
animals.description: My name is Penny. My favourite thing to do is chill in the backyard following the sun! Just give me a big snuggle bed and I am set. I don't need much entertainment, I'm happy just being where you are.

animals.name: Gizmo
animals.description: My name is Gizmo. I am a shy and introverted guinea pig who enjoys the simple pleasures of life. I find comfort in hiding and observing his surroundings from the safety of my cozy hideout.

animals.name: Lucinda
animals.description: My name is Lucinda. I'm a sweet little girl who loves to spend her time munching veggies and relaxing in my castle surveying my kingdom (a.k.a. hutch in your house or garden).

animals.name: Demon
animals.description: My name is Demon. I'm an older dog that loves to find places around the house to sleep. I enjoy long, slow walks and lots of cuddles.

animals.name: Betty
animals.description: My name is Betty. I'm a delightful medium-haired tabby with a calm and affectionate demeanor. My soft, smoochy nature makes me a perfect companion for those cozy evenings and lazy afternoons.

animals.name: Arthur
animals.description: My name is Arthur. I am the perfect combination of both playful and sweet who loves the company of my human friends. I do have a bit of energy and like to run around a lot, so a family that can spend a bit of time playing with me each day would be really nice.

animals.name: Luna
animals.description: My name is Luna. I am an affectionate cuddle bug that loves the company of people! I can be a bit shy at first, but once I become more comfortable I will start to show my true affectionate side.

animals.name: Roscoe
animals.breed: American Staffordshire Terrier x Labrador Retriever
animals.description: My name is Roscoe. I love to spend time outside bathing in the sun and stretching my legs. I love to play with balls and toys, as well as going on long walks.

animals.name: Remy
animals.description: My name is Remy. I am very intelligent and love to play, so please give me lots of toys so I don't get bored. I can be quite shy sometimes but love to cuddle and hide in your pockets.

animals.name: Clarence
animals.description: My name is Clarence. I am a happy kitten who loves to play and has lots of love to give. I only have one eye, so will need to be indoors only, and prefer a quiet household.

animals.name: Kelly
animals.description: My name is Kelly. I like a more relaxed slow environment where things are predictable, and I get plenty of rest time. I just enjoy the simple things like sniffing around, eating, sleeping, and getting lots of attention from humans.

animals.name: Bella
animals.description: My name is Bella. I am a sweet staffy girl with a big heart. I can be quite excitable and need someone who can read my body language and help manage my energy. I prefer a home with older children who can engage with me safely.

animals.name: Nala
animals.breed: Shar Pei x Staffordshire Bull Terrier
animals.description: My name is Nala. I will be a little shy at first but once I get to know you, I am an extremely affectionate girl. I prefer to be able to take things at my own pace and so would benefit from a home with older children who can respect my boundaries and know when its time to give me a break.

animals.name: Ashley
animals.description: My name is Ashley. I am a shy but curious kitten. Loud noises tend to make me a tad wary, so I'm on the lookout for a tranquil haven where the serenity matches my gentle nature. If you have a quiet house, I believe we could be the perfect match.

animals.name: Cruise
animals.description: My name is Cruise. I am a playful rabbit and love attention and company from my humans in the form of gentle pats and quiet conversations. I would ideally like to go home to a quiet and peaceful household.

animals.name: Zeus
animals.description: My name is Zeus. I'm a big boy, all grown up with my silly puppy days well behind me. I enjoy the simple things in life, a good snooze, some tasty foods, some people to hang out with, and some nice green grass. Don't let my size fool you, I'm actually very gentle and sweet natured, the perfect companion for almost any household!

animals.name: Marley
animals.description: My name is Marley. I'm a sweet little girl that is on the search for my new furever home! I love to lounge around more then run around so I won't need to go out all that often. I will need a nice cool place especially in the hotter months as it is harder for me to breath then most other dogs.

animals.name: Jellybean
animals.description: My name is Jellybean. I am friendly and loving but being a rabbit I can scare easily so I don’t like being handled too roughly. A little time and patience with handling should have me snuggling up to you in no time.

animals.name: Buster
animals.description: My name is Buster. I am a super smart and handsome bundle of love just waiting for my very own family to come and adopt me. I would love to have indoor and outdoor access in my new home, I love my humans and can see myself curled up on the couch with you at night watching our fav show.

animals.name: Winston
animals.description: My name is Winston. I am a very curious and happy puppy, excited to explore the world with you! I have a lot of energy and love playing with toys, learning new tricks and getting yummy treats.

animals.name: Raymond
animals.description: My name is Raymond. I am a playful guinea pig that does well with kids.  I would love a nice and secure enclosure with plenty on hiding spaces. I love to be handled but need supervision with kids.

animals.name: Dixon
animals.description: My name is Dixon. I'm a medium energy boy and will love to be occupied throughout the day, but I do love my naps too! I would love to have nice quiet walks, lots of yummy treats, play with the family, and maybe even have a nice sand pit to dig in.

animals.name: Katana
animals.description: My name is Katana. I adore being close to my humans, whether it's snuggling on the couch, curling up in your lap, or simply rubbing against your legs for attention. My purrs will be music to your ears, and my gentle demeanor will make you feel truly cherished.

animals.name: Sonic
animals.description: My name is Sonic. I am a sweet and active little boy. I am looking for a loving family who will spoil me with love and attention. I love to cuddle and play and I am waiting for my new best friend to spend my life with.

animals.name: Woody
animals.description: My name is Woody. I am a nice and young rabbit with lots of love to give. After getting to know me, you will start to see my playful side and everyone who meets me makes sure to tell me how adorable I am.
